LanguageData.PenaltyWornByCorpseTooltip: Should Worn by Corpse matter in calculations?
LanguageData.AutoWorkPrioritiesTooltip: If enabled, automatically adds weights for stats that are relevant to the assigned work types.
LanguageData.TemperatureRangeReset: Reset temperature range to seasonal temperature
LanguageData.AutoTempTooltip: If enabled, automatically set the temperature range to the current seasonal temperature plus an offset
LanguageData.AutoTempOffsetTooltip: The amount to use as a buffer around the current seasonal temperature
LanguageData.StatPriorityReset: Reset priority for {0} to template priorities
LanguageData.OutfitShow: Toogle apparel score for selected colonist.
